artist: Artist: Arthur Rackham; Author: J. M. Barrie; Publisher: Hodder & Stoughton, London; Printer: T. & A. Constable, Edinburgh University Press
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
description: binding: Full red buckram; gold-stamped lettering and designs; endpapers: brown wove map of "Peter Pan's Kensington Garden" printed in blue ink (front only); 138 pp. (excluding illustrations)
medium: Reproductions of pen and ink drawings; letterpress
provenance: Dorothy Millett Lindeke, Wayzata, Minn.; Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke, Wayzata, Minn.; bequethed to MIA, 1987.
title: Peter Pan in Kensington Garden
